name: catfish
content:
catfish noun [C]
(FISH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fish with a flat head and long hairs around its mouth that lives in rivers or lakes
Bruno/Moment Open/GettyImages

catfish noun [C]
(FAKE)
informal someone who pretends on social media to be someone different, in order to trick or attract other people: Online scammers and catfish usually have broad profile interests so that they can appeal to as many people as possible.

to try to trick or attract someone by pretending on social media to be someone different: If a random, attractive person starts talking to you online, you are very likely being catfished.
More examplesFewer examplesPeople who catfish others usually make up fake lives so they can be as extravagant as they want to be.If someone seems to be falling for you after just a little contact with you, they’re probably trying to catfish you.
